item.title: The Beatles - Come Together
item.description: This ukulele lesson by Katie DeNure features a tutorial on how to play Come Together by the Beatles and a beautiful play along performed by her.

item.title: Katie DeNure Ukulele Lessons
item.description: Katie DeNure is a music teacher at One Music School which offers private Guitar, Voice, and Ukulele lessons online via Skype.

item.title: Interactive Circle of Fifths
item.description: The Interactive Circle of Fifths is a tool for guitar and ukulele players to help pick chords that go together well when making music.

item.title: GCEA For Those About To Strum - Ukulele Rocker Design Cognac
item.description: A cool design for ukulele players who enjoy hard rock and heavy metal music and mostly play their uke in standard C-tuning. It shows the letters G, C, E and A in a hard rock style font separated by a ukulele icon, the text “FOR THOSE ABOUT TO” in a serif font and the word strum with 4 strings cut out. Keep on rocking and strumming! • Also buy this artwork on apparel, stickers, phone cases, and more.

item.title: GCEA For Those About To Strum - Ukulele Rocker Design White
item.description: A cool design for ukulele players who enjoy hard rock and heavy metal music and mostly play their uke in standard C-tuning. It shows the letters G, C, E and A in a hard rock style font separated by a ukulele icon, the text “FOR THOSE ABOUT TO” in a serif font and the word strum with 4 strings cut out. Keep on rocking and strumming! • Also buy this artwork on apparel, phone cases, home decor, and more.

item.title: Understanding the Major Diatonic Scale
item.description: In this music theory fundamentals lesson Steve Stine explains the major diatonic scale and shows how several scales are built up step by step.

item.title: Steve Stine Guitar Channel
item.description: The channel of guitarist and teacher Steve Stine features lessons on music theory, guitar technique as well as riff and song tutorials with a good dose of heavy metal music.

item.title: How to Memorize the Notes on the Guitar Fretboard
item.description: Erich Andreas breaks down the basic things you need to know to memorize the entire fretboard of a guitar.

item.title: YourGuitarSage: Tutorials, Technique, Theory and Exercises
item.description: The channel of professional guitarist and teacher Erich Andreas with song tutorials, technique, theory and exercises mainly for guitar and some ukulele.

item.title: Ukulele lesson 1 - Anatomy of the Uke and Basic Technique
item.description: In this introductory ukulele lesson Erich Andreas shows you the anatomy of the ukulele, discusses left and right hand technique as well as picking and strumming.
